EmailTemplate.name: Quote Approval Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Quote.OwnerFirstName} {!Quote.OwnerLastName},
Your quote {!Quote.QuoteNumber} - {!Quote.Name} with an amount of {!Quote.Amount__c} has been approved.
Approved comments: {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
Kind regards,
Please consider the environment before printing this email Krinkels nv - RPR Brussel – BE0821 547 933 - Rue Emile Pathéstraat 410 1190 Bruxelles/Brussel
